name: A Part Of Life
description: Choose your life in our new life simulation game named "A part of life" you want a  life simulation game that worked on low PC and with updates in the future with great 2D and top down graphics you need to choose "A part of life" the game  have : buy/build mode,skills,relationships,town,jobs,needs bar hunger,bladder,fun ....,health of life(mood) works  and more activities ..... make your player happy now on A Part Of Life ! Work get money to buy new things to your house and decorate it also make friends and discover secret lots and things in game from relationships,day/night cycle effect the places in game closed/open , and much much more , also the game will have updates also stuff,game,expansions packs on the future make sure you get your hand on our base game first !
